projects.name: Mobick Mania
projects.description: Using client’s Figma Design files, worked on the design and functionality of specific pages and components. Integrated Shopify store with third party delivery and shopping apps. Worked on data transfer as a part of full data migration between different platforms. Created and managed AWS ec2 instance as a server for the application code. Installed SSL and deployed application code to the running server.
